summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear on November 29, 2021, to testify and produce evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena is dated July 28, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which the subpoena is issued.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 28, 2021, for an individual to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
The subpoena commands the recipient to appear on November 29, 2021, at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
